author: Jon Porter
title: Google donates free Chromebooks and 100,000 mobile hotspots for rural California students
description: Google will provide 4,000 Chromebooks and 100,000 Wi-Fi hotspots to students in California, who will have to learn from home in the coming months as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic. The initiative was announced by California governor Gavin Newsom and Google…
content:
4,000 Chromebooks and free unlimited hotspot usage for at least three months
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Google will provide 4,000 Chromebooks and fund the use of 100,000 Wi-Fi hotspots for rural students in California, who are studying from hom… [+2495 chars]
